notes:
### v1.3.8
#### NEW FEATURES
- added boss only damage option. meter will only track bosses that are a Boss or Legion Commander
- added color codes for difficulty of the content
- added color codes to indicate raid cleared
- updated screenshot tool to include raid cleared, and boss only damage
#### BUG FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS
- fixed issue where logs will crash when showing latest encounter, while inspecting a player
full patch notes on github
send bug reports/suggestions to discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5
